io.mosip.registration.device.scanner.impl

Class DocumentScannerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mosip.registration.device.scanner.impl.DocumentScannerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMosipDocumentScannerService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentScannerSaneServiceImpl, DocumentScannerWiaServiceImpl

    @Service
public abstract class DocumentScannerService
extends Object
implements IMosipDocumentScannerService
    This class is used to handle all the requests related to scanner devices through Sane Daemon service
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    balamurugan.ramamoorthy
